inclusion.criterion: 10-point visual analog scale (VAS) system for pain score
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Videourodynamic study and potassium chloride (KCl) sensitivity test
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Written, informed consent will be obtained before treatment
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Randomly assigned to receive intravesical injection of 100U of BoNT-A
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Blood (10ml) and urine samples (30ml) will be collected before intravesical injection
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Bladder wall biopsies will also be performed after hydrodistention
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: The patients will be allocated to treatment or control group by the permuted block randomization code
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Each vial of BoNT-A will be diluted with 10 ml of normal saline, resulting in 10U BoNT-A per 1.0 ml
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Cystoscopic hydrodistention will be performed to an intravesical pressure of 80 cm water for 15 minutes
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: previous study has shown that ulcer type IC/BPS does not respond to intravesical BoNT-A injection
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: generalized muscle weakness, difficult urination, transient urinary retention, or urinary tract infections
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 78 year-old male with h/o BPH s/p multiple urological procedures. Severe 2cm bulbar urethral stricture found during flexible cystoscopy.
